mapper.select: SELECT rep.NO, rep.WRITER_ID, rep.REPORTER_ID, rep.CONTENT, rep.STATUS, rep.REPORT_DATE, rev.CONTENT AS reviewContent, u.UNFREEZE_DATE FROM REPORT_TBL rep JOIN REVIEW_TBL rev ON rep.REF_NO = rev.NO LEFT JOIN USER_TBL u ON rep.REPORTER_ID = u.USER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT_TBL (NO, WRITER_ID, REPORTER_ID, REF_NO, CONTENT, REPORT_DATE, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_REPORT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writerId}, #{reporterId}, #{refNo}, #{content}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
